front.title: IEEE Draft Guide for the Application of Surge Protective Devices for Low Voltage (1000 Volts or Less) AC Power Circuits Amendment: SPD Disconnector Application Considerations and Coordination for use in Low Voltage AC (1000 V or Less, 50 or 60 Hz) Power Circuits
front.abstract: The application considerations for surge-protective device disconnectors and the coordination of these devices in low-voltage ac power circuits are defined in this amendment. Application consideration details, potential issues, and recommendations are provided.
